S.FORM: == satangahan : == abala u zuma a kamu : nu Hulam :肩膀 nu Amilika :shoulder nu Zipun :肩 u canan ku abala(abala是什麼?)ː namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan ː == malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan ː ==

== satangahan : == abala o zoma a kamo : no Holam :肩膀 no Amilika :shoolder no Zipon :肩 o canan ko abala(abala是什麼?)ː namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan ː == malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan ː ==
